law.catch_line: The State may not acquire a tract of land in Allegany County of over 100 acres for preservation of o...
law.text: The State may not acquire a tract of land in Allegany County of over 100 acres for preservation of open spaces unless the County Commissioners of Allegany County approve the purchase. This requirement does not apply to open space and outdoor recreation areas which have previously been authorized for acquisition by the legislature.
